document.full_text: sony corp unveiled the pricing of its new playstation vita handheld games device at a flashy los angeles event and immediately ran into criticism the gadget was too expensive.
document.title: sony unveils new handheld device, seen expensive
lines_and_colors: sony corp unveiled the pricing of its new playstation vita handheld games device at a flashy los angeles event and immediately ran into criticism the gadget was too expensive.
